definition: to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to interview (a particular person or on a particular topic)/special interview/special report based on such an interview
complaint letter/petition letter/see also 上訪|上访[shang4 fang3]
to go and visit in an official capacity or for investigation
to seek an audience with higher-ups (esp. government officials) to petition for sth
to pay a visit/to call on
to seek by inquiry or search/to call on/to visit

sentences.english: Liu Bei lost no time in telling his brothers the story of King Wen bent on visiting one of his subjects called Jiang Ziya.
sentences.chinese: 劉備忙講了當年文王訪姜子牙的故事。

sentences.english: The same was the result of PMs Japan Visit and Obama's India Visit.
sentences.chinese: 莫迪訪日和奧巴馬訪印度的結果也是如此。

sentences.english: A diamond cut white gold "X" intersects three ribbons of 14K yellow gold.
sentences.chinese: 訪鑽石切割的白金“X”貫穿了三帶式的14K黃金。

sentences.english: The Afghan government attaches great importance to the visit of the special envoy of the Chinese government.
sentences.chinese: 阿政府高度重視中方派特使訪阿。

sentences.english: I imagine in summer evening, the somebody else sleeps late somely, hence emit night to visit him.
sentences.chinese: 我料想在夏天晚上，人家睡得晚些，故而冒夜去訪他。

definition: to seek by inquiry or search/to call on/to visit
to pay a visit/to call on
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
